name: unchlorinated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unchlorinated water has no chlorine (= a chemical with a strong smell) to kill bacteria added to it: an unchlorinated swimming pool She celebrates the joys of swimming in wild, unchlorinated water. Compare
chlorinated
More examplesFewer examplesThe bacteria was isolated more frequently from unchlorinated water than from chlorinated supplies.Apparently, a failure at the treatment works led to unchlorinated water entering the system.The unchlorinated community water supply was also implicated as the most likely source of the infection.There is something special about being able to swim in deep, unchlorinated water.
